fact.description: The match is underway in Rio de Janeiro.
Throw-in for Belgium at Estadio do Maracana.
Corner awarded to Belgium.
Alexander Samedov is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Play has been resumed.
Throw-in Russia.
Dries Mertens (Belgium) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Alexander Samedov is back on his feet again.
Felix Brych signals a Belgium throw-in in Russia's half.
Belgium to take a throw-in in Russia territory.
Russia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Russia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Belgium get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
Belgium's Marouane Fellaini is whistled for offside at Estadio do Maracana.
Throw-in for Belgium in their own half.
Ball safe as Russia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Russia have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Belgium in their own half.
Russia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Russia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Belgium get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
Ball safe as Belgium is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Belgium at Estadio do Maracana.
Ball goes out of play for a Russia goal kick.
Throw-in for Belgium in their own half.
Belgium's Romelu Lukaku gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Felix Brych awards Russia a goal kick.
Throw-in Belgium.
Throw-in for Belgium at Estadio do Maracana.
In Rio de Janeiro Belgium attack through Dries Mertens. The finish is off target, however.
Goal kick for Russia at Estadio do Maracana.
Ball safe as Russia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Russia to take a throw-in in Belgium territory.
Belgium have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Russia in their own half.
Throw-in Russia.
Belgium have a goal kick.
Russia drive forward and Oleg Shatov gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Belgium awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marc Wilmots (Belgium) is making a first substitution, with Jan Vertonghen replacing Thomas Vermaelen.
Felix Brych signals a Belgium throw-in in Russia's half.
Felix Brych signals a Belgium throw-in in Russia's half.
Russia have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Belgium in their own half.
Felix Brych awards Belgium a goal kick.
Oleg Shatov of Russia smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Belgium awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Russia in their own half.
Belgium's Dries Mertens gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Belgium in their own half.
Denis Glushakov (Russia) gets a yellow card.
Can Belgium get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
Important block from the Russia defence as Romelu Lukaku fires in a strike for Belgium.
Russia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Russia.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Belgium in their own half.
Russia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Russia have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Victor Fayzulin for Russia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Belgium at Estadio do Maracana.
Russia attack but Aleksander Kokorin's header doesn't find the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Belgium goal kick.
Ball safe as Belgium is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Belgium.
Belgium's Axel Witsel breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Russia have a goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Throw-in for Russia at Estadio do Maracana.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Belgium in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the first half.
Belgium awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Belgium in their own half.
Russia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Belgium to take a throw-in in Russia territory.
Throw-in Russia.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Belgium in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Axel Witsel.
Felix Brych has blown to resume play in Rio de Janeiro.
Russia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Axel Witsel is back on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Russia.
Russia are pushing forward but Denis Glushakov's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Belgium goal kick.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Russia in their own half.
Axel Witsel (Belgium) has received a first yellow card.
Goal kick for Belgium at Estadio do Maracana.
Felix Brych awards Russia a goal kick.
Throw-in for Russia in their own half.
Divock Origi is on a sub for Romelu Lukaku for Belgium.
Throw-in for Belgium at Estadio do Maracana.
Goal kick for Russia at Estadio do Maracana.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Aleksei Kozlov for Russia who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Play is underway once more.
Russia's Aleksei Kozlov looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Can Belgium get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
Fabio Capello (Russia) has taken off Aleksei Kozlov who seemed to be grimacing with pain earlier. A possible injury. Andrey Eshchenko is the replacement.
Throw-in for Belgium close to the penalty box.
Felix Brych signals a throw-in for Belgium, close to Russia's area.
Throw-in Russia.
Felix Brych signals a Belgium throw-in in Russia's half.
Russia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Russia to take a throw-in in Belgium territory.
Belgium needs to be cautious. Russia have an attacking throw-in.
Belgium drive forward but Divock Origi is judged offside.
Russia to take a throw-in in Belgium territory.
Felix Brych signals a Russia throw-in in Belgium's half.
Corner awarded to Russia.
Free kick Russia.
Ball safe as Russia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Russia.
Belgium awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Belgium awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Russia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Dries Mertens for Belgium is whistled offside.
Can Belgium get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
Felix Brych signals a Belgium throw-in in Russia's half.
Russia have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Corner awarded to Russia.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Russia.
Sergey Ignashevich (Russia) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Belgium goal kick.
Toby Alderweireld (Belgium) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Russia's Denis Glushakov breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Belgium have a goal kick.
Marc Wilmots is making the team's third substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Kevin Mirallas replacing Dries Mertens.
Russia have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Can Russia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belgium's half?
Russia to take a throw-in in Belgium territory.
Belgium to take a throw-in in Russia territory.
Russia push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Denis Glushakov gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Belgium defence.
Belgium's Divock Origi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Russia defender.
Divock Origi of Belgium is pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for Russia at Estadio do Maracana.
Russia's Andrey Eshchenko misses with an attempt on goal.
Felix Brych awards Belgium a goal kick.
Belgium have a goal kick.
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Belgium.
Russia make their second substitution with Alan Dzagoev replacing Oleg Shatov.
Throw-in for Belgium in their own half.
Belgium's Kevin Mirallas fires in a great shot but is denied by the woodwork.
Throw-in Belgium.
Kevin Mirallas for Belgium drives towards goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Belgium have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Belgium's Kevin De Bruyne has run offside.
Eden Hazard with an assist there.
Free kick Russia.
Felix Brych awards Belgium a goal kick.
Aleksandr Kerzhakov is replacing Alexander Samedov for Russia at Estadio do Maracana.
Corner awarded to Belgium.
Felix Brych signals a Belgium throw-in in Russia's half.
At Estadio do Maracana the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the second half.
Can Belgium get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Russia's half?
Felix Brych signals a free kick to Russia in their own half.
In Rio de Janeiro Belgium drive forward through Kevin Mirallas. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Belgium have a dangerous throw-in.
Belgium have been awarded a corner by Felix Brych.
Throw-in for Russia in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-0.
